ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package fat-free cream cheese, softened

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for 30 minutes for easier mixing
Finely chop walnuts to create a uniform texture in the filling
Chill stuffed dates for 30 minutes before serving for better presentation
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the Halloween theme and how to pipe or stuff the cream cheese mixture attractively into date cavities for dramatic effect.
